content:
Is it expected that this code compile using specialization? I would've expected it to, yet it does not: https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=nightly&mode=debug&edition=2018&gist=c6ef00e1a82b0f82e69038e143e95100

The former more-generic and default impl I would've expected to be overruled in favor of the more specific impl Accept<String> for Parent, yet I get an error.
